text:
Around 100 years ago, my family
immigrated from Italy to Brazil

Some of my most precious
childhood memories

are at my grandfather's
small farm.

He taught me to love and
adore nature and animals,

while my grandmother taught me
by example to be a strong woman

That's why I became an
agronomic engineer worried

My childhood days are long
gone, and climate change just

became more and more
worrying problem.

That's why my life's purpose
is to build a future where

growing population has
access to nutritious food

whose production replenishes
and protects the land.
